sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Plus, TrendingUp, Target } from 'lucide-react'; import './FinancialSummary.css'; const FinancialSummary = ({ totalTarget, totalCurrent, overallProgress, onAddGoal }) => { const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 0, maximumFractionDigits: 0, }).format(amount); }; return (

Financial Overview

Total Target

{formatCurrency(totalTarget)}

Current Savings

{formatCurrency(totalCurrent)}

Overall Progress

{overallProgress.toFixed(1)}%

); }; export default FinancialSummary;
